title: Scorn of the Moon - My Diana/Leona Illustration!
body:
https://31.media.tumblr.com/950ce9f7960b0d877281f730ae8c7505/tumblr_nb10c3IeuY1qk32lpo1_1280.png

Hey guys! Diana's lore is undoubtedly my favorite in the game, and everything about her as a champion and her tragic dynamic with Leona is one of my favorite themes within League. This is a little illustration I made a while back to vent my feelings, figured I'd share! Hope you guys like it! Thinking about revisiting it now that it's a bit older and touching things up.

replies.body:
Oh my gosh, this is gorgeous! <3 

Beautifully done!
Ahhh thank you very much!!! I really appreciate it, I'm glad you like it!  <3 <3
<3 Would you be cool if I made it my phone background?  :3
Absolutely!!! I'd be totally flattered C:
did u draw this Q-Q and if u did... CAN YOU SHOW ME YOUR WAYS Q-Q so beautiful {{item:3070}}
I did! Thank you so much! C:
wow your're so talented! keep up the good work! I only wish i was artistic haha
Thanks!

My Diana! Incredible!
{{champion:131}} <3
Thank you so much!!! <3
Call the parrot!
Hauntingly beautiful
Wow that is really beautiful!
Wow! Very nice!
Added this to my screen saver =]

I really enjoy your use of negative and positive space. (haven't said that since college, feels weird) seriously though, I do. dianas hairline keeps throwing me off though... it is at a different angle than the rest of her facial features, and the jawbone shading on diana is a bit contradictory. its straight on one side then round on the other.

I like the emotion in your composition most of all though.
Well done
Wow, Diana is so underrated and I love her too! This looks amazing!

You did a beautiful job with the shading and details! I love her facial expression... she looks like a fighter. Thank you for sharing! Also, I'm with KateyKhoas - this would make an amazing background!

This looks great, I love the Diana/Leona conflict but I side with the Solari. Beautiful work. 
{{champion:89}}**>** {{champion:131}}
I am a huge fan of Diana and Leona's shared background and the potentially tragic relationship therein. This is an awesome pic. Thanks for sharing!
That side view reminds too much of Valkyrie Profile.

Nicely done.

And wait patiently wait for her rework... which work on has not begun...
Looks badass!
Holy shit this is some fine detail
